org.mongodb.codecs

Class BSONDocumentBufferCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mongodb.codecs.BSONDocumentBufferCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Codec<BSONDocumentBuffer>, CollectibleCodec<BSONDocumentBuffer>, Decoder<BSONDocumentBuffer>, Encoder<BSONDocumentBuffer>

    public class BSONDocumentBufferCodec
extends Object
implements CollectibleCodec<BSONDocumentBuffer>
    A simple BSONDocumentBuffer codec. It does not attempt to validate the contents of the underlying ByteBuffer. It assumes that it contains a single encoded BSON document.

    This should even be usable as a nested document codec by adding an instance of it to a PrimitiveCodecs instance.
